lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 5 (U.P.) -- A matinee performance of the play "Distant Point," at the Westminster Theatre, was interrupted by Manager Reginald Knight to announce that the author, Alexander Afinogenoff had been killed in an air raid on Moscow.
abstract: A Afinogenoff, USSR playwright, killed in Moscow air raid
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 5 (U.P.) -- A matinee performance of the play "Distant Point," at the Westminster Theatre, was interrupted by Manager Reginald Knight to announce that the author, Alexander Afinogenoff had been killed in an air raid on Moscow....
